price: So We saved him and his family except his wife[32]; she was one of those who remained behind.
arabic: فَأَنجَيۡنَٰهُ وَأَهۡلَهُۥٓ إِلَّا ٱمۡرَأَتَهُۥ كَانَتۡ مِنَ ٱلۡغَٰبِرِينَ
footnotes: [32] Because she condoned the degrading behavior of her people, and she was a disbeliever.
